messages.message: Noticing that `UnitsRequiredDropdownItem` will call `api/v2/licenses/billing-plan` every time it mounts, even if React Query has the data in `fresh` state because `refetchOnMount: 'always'` here (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/47e15be12b6069ae2997a8efc926b262cd7fa1c6/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/apps/src/aihub/store/queries.ts#L711). Wondering if we can set it back to the default so that we don't keep calling this endpoint. The backend should handle the invalid license case already and fetching it once on page load should be enough?
the user could take actions that use units before reloading though, so loading the available units once per page load isnâ€™t enough
if we think that's not enough, we can keep this until we run into bottleneck in api requests
